description: Brooklyn's Muslim Presence Goes Back Centuries, Here's Proof From 1643 - The New York Times
extended: The Brooklyn Historical Society acquires the deed giving 200 acres near Coney Island to Anthony van Salee, the first known person of Muslim origin to settle in America.
